about_the_game:
Get ready for a slimy adventure in 'Turf Wars: A Snail Escape'! As a colorful snail hero, you'll need to navigate through dangerous areas, battle difficult bosses, and expand your turf before your enemies do. This isn't just any garden - it's a roguelike adventure bursting with upgrades. So, are you ready to out-slime your foes and head out on this epic snail-paced adventure? (just kidding, it's fast!🐌)


The garden is a dangerous place, so follow these tips:

  • Remain on your turf
  • Plan your moves and make sure you got an escape route
  • Pick weapons and upgrades strategically


Using the right slime type will be the difference between easily sliding down the garden or drying out.

  • Grey - Unclaimed territory
  • Yellow - Fast & recharges weapons
  • Green - Ultrafast!
  • Red - Ultraslow!
  • Black - Hurts... a lot


A wild variety of powerful weapons and tools awaits. Equip up to 4 out of the 20 unique items available, try out different slime types, and unlock over 100 upgrades. Earn coins for in-run upgrades or gather gems to unlock permanent enhancements. Prepare for endless possibilities where you need to constantly adapt your strategy.



We strive to offer an inclusive gaming experience for all players, so you can always turn on the dedicated colorblind mode that utilizes shapes instead of colors. You can also navigate the garden with either controller or keyboard, both with remapping and autofire options, offering flexibility and freedom in how you play. More inexperienced snails can also turn down the heat a bit with extra difficulty settings.

So what are you waiting for? Gear up and jump into the Turf Wars - the battle awaits!
